reporter_caption.center: GLENN v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION, 97 EM 2010 (Pa. 10-7-2010)

caption.center: CLARENCE GLENN, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 7th day of October, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.Page 1
